caption.p: ( a) Accumulation of Biomass in callus cultures of Fagonia indica under photoperiod (16L/8D h) after eliciting with various treatments (0–10.8 kJ/m 2) of UV-C radiations. ( b) Accumulation of biomass in callus cultures of Fagonia indica under contineous light (24 h) after eliciting with various treatments of UV-C radiations. ( c) Accumulation of biomass in callus cultures of Fagonia indica under complete dark (24 h) after eliciting with various treatments (0–10.8 kJ/m 2) of UV-C radiations. Values represented as mean ± SE of three replicates. Different (black for FW, red for DW) letters represent significant differences between the various experimental conditions ( p < 0.05).
